product_name: Mountain Hardwear Ancona Trek Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made of super lightweight soft-shell fabric, the women's Mountain Hardwear Ancona Trek Shorts are built with sun protection and plenty of stretch for long treks and tough hikes. Nylon/spandex fabric offers 4-way stretch, abrasion resistance and outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Durable water repellent finish sheds light precipitation. Micro-Chamois(TM)-lined seamless conical waist provides comfort under a pack. Integrated webbing belt has buckle closure for easy fit adjustments. Full-length inseam gusset frees up mobility. Mountain Hardwear Ancona Trek Shorts for women feature a 12 in. inseam for great coverage.
short_description: Made of super lightweight soft-shell fabric, the women's Mountain Hardwear Ancona Trek Shorts are built with sun protection and plenty of stretch for long treks and tough hikes.
